sentence.value: However, during this time Chaffee actually flew the U.S. Navy A3D-2P/RA-3B (a reconnaissance version of the carrier-based Douglas Skywarrior heavy attack/nuclear strike bomber).
sentence.annotated-sentence: However, during this time Chaffee actually flew the [[U.S.|United_States]] [[Navy|United_States_Navy]] A3D-2P/RA-3B (a [[reconnaissance|Reconnaissance]] version of the carrier-based [[Douglas|Douglas_Aircraft_Company]] [[Skywarrior|Douglas_A-3_Skywarrior]] heavy attack/nuclear strike [[bomber|Strategic_bomber]]).
